A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not being the biggest Star Wars fan\, I didn't really know what to expect. Admittedly\, I was anticipating a more thrilling movie than what I saw but overall\, I enjoyed it. This one had a much different feel than other  movies and was darker in tone. There definitely is still humor there but it went for a more gripping storyline. There were some questionable choices\, including an ill-advised romance subplot and questionable decisions as far as character development but it was solid overall.
